item.title: VMware ESXi 4 vs ESXi 5 Log File Locations
item.description: This post is inspired by a tweet from Andrew Storrs, where he pinpoints that the host log file locations have changed between ESXi 4 and ESXi 5. Note: This post has been updated with new log files for ESXi 5.1 ESXi 4 Log File Locations: [table id=6 /] ESXi 5 Log File Locations: [table id=5 /] Between version 5.0 and 5.1 the log file locations have not changed, but a couple of new logs have been added.
